title: Slot Shots Pinball Ultimate Edition
description: Get ready for the next edition of Slot Shots Pinball featuring five brand new tables along with all of the original tables released in 2022. It is Steam Deck compatible and it runs at a very smooth 60 FPS. Each of our new tables feature beautiful 3d background environments , new camera angles, wider and more detailed playfields, better looking LEDs, better graphical assets and special effects, more complex missions, online leaderboards to compete on, full controller, sixty achievements, mouse keyboard support, and finally every new table has a twenty+ minute soundtrack to listen to while you play. Each table has the classic three ball mode, lots of missions, and multiball waiting to be activated . Lobotomy Corporation

system_requirements.Graphics: card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
